text: Adnan Badran () (born 15 December 1935) is a Jordanian scientist, academic and politician. He was the Prime Minister of Jordan from 6 April 2005 to 27 November 2005. Badran was born in Jerash, Jordan, on 15 December 1935. He received his Bachelor of Science from Oklahoma State University and his MS and Ph.D. degrees from Michigan State University. ==References== ==Other websites== * Oral History Interview with Adnan Badran, Oklahoma Oral History Research Program at the OSU Library Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Jordan
title: Adnan Badran
